shortdesc.ph: Sets the dual-stream mode and low-quality stream on the sender side.
Sets the dual-stream mode and low-quality stream at the sender.

p.codeblock: virtual int enableDualStreamMode(bool enabled, const SimulcastStreamConfig& streamConfig) __deprecated = 0;
public abstract int enableDualStreamMode(boolean enabled, SimulcastStreamConfig streamConfig)

dlentry.dd: Deprecated since v4.2.0. Use setDualStreamMode instead.
Deprecated since v4.2.0. Use setDualStreamMode instead.

section.p:
You can call this method to enable or disable dual-stream mode on the sender side. Dual-stream mode means sending both high-quality and low-quality video streams:
High-quality stream: high bitrate and resolution.
Low-quality stream: low bitrate and resolution. After enabling dual-stream mode, you can call to select the high or low-quality stream on the receiver side.

You can call this method to enable or disable dual-stream mode at the sender. Dual-stream consists of one high-quality and one low-quality video stream:
High-quality stream: High bitrate, high resolution.
Low-quality stream: Low bitrate, low resolution. After enabling dual-stream mode, you can call the setRemoteVideoStreamType method on the receiver side to choose to receive the high-quality or low-quality stream.

ul.li: This method applies to all types of video streams on the sender side, including but not limited to camera capture, screen sharing, and custom video streams.
To enable dual-stream mode in multi-channel scenarios, use .
You can call this method before or after joining a channel.
This method applies to all types of video streams on the sender side, including but not limited to camera-captured video, screen sharing, and custom captured video streams.
If you need to enable dual-stream mode in a multi-channel scenario, you can call the method.
You can call this method either before or after joining a channel.

plentry.pd:
Whether to enable dual-stream mode:
: Enable dual-stream mode.
: (default) Disable dual-stream mode.
Configuration for the low-quality stream. See . When mode is set to DISABLE_SIMULCAST_STREAM, streamConfig has no effect.

Whether to enable dual-stream mode:
: Enable dual-stream mode.
: (Default) Disable dual-stream mode.
Configuration of the low-quality stream. See . When mode is set to DISABLE_SIMULCAST_STREAM, streamConfig has no effect.
